name: Looking For Memories
description:
After being defeated at the hands of archenemy Aaron, who has lost his memory, his journey to regain his memory begins in the beautiful village of Haworth. There he has new teammates, they explore the world together. After many trials and tribulations, Aaron will finally have to defeat the one who took his memory and regain it.

Game Features:

- RPG with rich storytelling!

- Explore the vast world!

- Find puzzle pieces to craft complete weapons!

- Trade with NPCs!

- Explore dungeons for many rare rewards!

- Create a guild, upgrade a guild!

- Rotation luck!

- Each character's skill is unique, the effect is smooth!

- Character voice in battle!
